Package de.hsrt.holbox.util

package de.hsrt.holbox.util
Utilities package. Contains ultilities necessary for the code representation and execution.
Author:
notholt

A note on variable names

In order to have a more or less common naming of variables we should follow the following convention for variables (either parameters or signals):
Examples
Short Name Meaning
Pv Photovoltaic Used when referring to a PV-System Gen Generator set Used when referring to a Genset Batt Batterie Used when referring to an energy storage system Wind Wind Used when referring to a wind park/turbine
  • Class
    Description
    BusParameter
     
    ChangeListener<T>
    Interface defining a ChangeListener for bidirectional Binding but independent from the JavaFX implementation
    ConfigurationException
    Defines a configuration error like, for example, if parameters are outside the possible values.
    DataPoint
     
    Dataset
     
    DoubleParameter
     
    EnergyCounter
    Function implementing a discrete integrator based on the backward euler method as per: y(k) = y(k-1) + x(k)*dTa It takes an input Signal and integrates on the specific time step Ta.
    EquipmentParameter
     
    FileParameter
    Class defining the general properties of Parameters.
    IntegerParameter
     
    Integrator
    Function implementing a discrete energy counter based on the backward euler method as per: y(k) = y(k-1) + x(k)*dTa It takes an input Signal and integrates on the specific time step Ta.
    Limiter
     
    LineParameter
     
    ModelCodeException
    Defines an error in the model, for example, when configuring new parameters.
    NumberParameter<T extends Number & Comparable<T>>
    Class defining the general properties of Parameters.
    Parameter<T>
     
    ParameterList
    Manages a list of Parameters.
    PofF
     
    PQEnvelope
     
    PT1
     
    Settings
    An abstract class representing the settings of a specific task/workflow.
    Signal
    Represents a signal conveyed by any object
    SignalList
    Manages a list of Parameters.
    Simulatable
    The interface describes the common necessary functions to make a class simulatable by Holbox engine
    StringParameter
    Class defining the general properties of Parameters.
    VolumeCounter
    Function implementing a discrete integrator based on the backward euler method as per: y(k) = y(k-1) + x(k)*dTa It takes an input Signal and integrates on the specific time step Ta.
